title: Single Family Home with Detached Studio – Grote Berg, Curaçao
description: Bai Pe Real Estate proudly presents this move-in-ready modern family home located in the desirable neighborhood of Grote Berg, Curaçao. Situated on 715 m² of owned land, this property offers contemporary comfort, privacy, and strong investment potential. The property features a private swimming pool and a detached studio ideal for rental income, guests, or a home office. Grote Berg is a quiet, well-connected residential area with easy access to Willemstad and popular beaches.
